nouns: Dawn is the time that marks the beginning of the twilight before sunrise.
The part of the day between dawn and midday.
Fictional planet in Isaac Asimov's Robot series
Aurora is a fictional planet in Isaac Asimov's Robot series.
Time of day.
The part of the day from dawn to midday.
The time of day at which the first crow of a cockerel is heard; dawn or daybreak; first light
The time of day when the sun above the eastern horizon.
The dawn
A world in Isaac Asimov's fiction
The beginning of the day; the first appearance of daylight in the morning.
The first light of day
The beginning.
Dawn.
A period of time at the beginning of the day shortly before sunrise during which the light gradually becomes stronger.
Dawn; sunrise; the moment at which the sun can first be seen on the horizon.
Sunrise or sun up is the instant at which the upper edge of the Sun appears over the eastern horizon in the morning.
Sunrise is the instant at which the upper edge of the Sun appears above the horizon in the east.
The beginning of the day, or first appearance of light; the dawn; daybreak.
The time of day when the sun appears above the eastern horizon.
The ascent of the sun above the eastern horizon in the morning.
Twilight is the time between dawn and sunrise, and the time between sunset and dusk.
A period of time at the end of the day shortly after sunset during which the light fades gradually.
Twilight, as at early morning or (especially) early evening; dusk
The darkest stage of twilight in the evening
Twilight.
Gloaming, twilight
The time when this light is visible; the period between daylight and darkness.
"Nightfall" is a 1941 science fiction short story by Isaac Asimov about the coming of darkness to the people of a planet ordinarily illuminated at all times on all sides.
A 1941 science fiction short story by Isaac Asimov, and later adaptations
The time of day immediately following sunset
A period of time occurring at the end of the day during which the sun sets.

Evenfall is the first short film in a series about a highly trained young woman embarking on her career as an international spy and discovering it takes more than good looks to keep things from falling into the wrong hands.
Dusk is the darkest stage of twilight in the evening.
The time between dawn and sunrise or between sunset and dusk
Twilight is the illumination of the Earth's lower atmosphere when the Sun itself is not directly visible because it is below the horizon.
Dusk, twilight
The close of the day; the coming of night.
A virtual object that is similar in shape to playing cards.
One of a pack of cards that are used to play card games
One of usually 52 rectangular pieces of card.
A group of one or more cards.

A playing card is a piece of specially prepared heavy paper, thin cardboard, plastic-coated paper, cotton-paper blend, or thin plastic, marked with distinguishing motifs and used as one of a set for playing card games.
One of usually 52 rectangular pieces of card used to play numerous games, featuring either one to 10 pips or a picture and belonging of one of four suits.
Playing cards are pieces of specially prepared heavy paper, thin cardboard, or thin plastic, figured with distinguishing motifs and used as one of a set for playing card games. cards

A piece of music composed for six voices or six instruments; a sextet or sestuor.
Six
A sextet is a formation containing exactly six members.
Natural number
6 is the natural number following 5 and preceding 7.
A numerical value equal to 6; the number occurring after five and before seven.
The cardinal number occurring after five and before seven, represented in Roman numerals as VI, in Arabic numerals as 6.
The cardinal number that is the sum of five and one
A clock is an instrument to indicate, keep, and co-ordinate time.
A timepiece that shows the time of day
An instrument used to measure or keep track of time.
Instrument that tells the time
Instrument to measure or keep track of time.
An instrument used to measure or keep track of time; a non-portable timepiece.

description: The face of an analog clock displaying the time as six o’clock.
apple_vendor_description: The six o'clock emoji on Apple devices presents a classic analog clock face with a polished, 3D appearance, exuding clarity and precision. Its hands are perfectly aligned to indicate exactly six, rendered with soft rounded edges and subtle gradients that give it a tactile feel. This emoji, bathed in Apple's signature realistic lighting, is a straightforward and elegant way to denote a specific time, often used for appointments, meetings, or indicating a precise moment in digital exchanges.
